	External calls:
	- ERC20(vether2).transferFrom(msg.sender,burnAddress,amount) (../..0x75572098dc462f976127f59f8c97dfa291f81d8b.sol#209)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _transfer(address(this),msg.sender,amount) (../..0x75572098dc462f976127f59f8c97dfa291f81d8b.sol#210)
		- _balances[_from] = _balances[_from].sub(_value) (../..0x75572098dc462f976127f59f8c97dfa291f81d8b.sol#153)
		- _balances[_to] += (_value.sub(_fee)) (../..0x75572098dc462f976127f59f8c97dfa291f81d8b.sol#155)
		- _balances[address(this)] += _fee (../..0x75572098dc462f976127f59f8c97dfa291f81d8b.sol#156)

	- _transfer(address(this),msg.sender,amount) (../..0x75572098dc462f976127f59f8c97dfa291f81d8b.sol#210)
		- holders += 1 (../..0x75572098dc462f976127f59f8c97dfa291f81d8b.sol#152)
	- _transfer(address(this),msg.sender,amount) (../..0x75572098dc462f976127f59f8c97dfa291f81d8b.sol#210)
		- mapHolder[_to] = true (../..0x75572098dc462f976127f59f8c97dfa291f81d8b.sol#152)
	- _transfer(address(this),msg.sender,amount) (../..0x75572098dc462f976127f59f8c97dfa291f81d8b.sol#210)
		- totalFees += _fee (../..0x75572098dc462f976127f59f8c97dfa291f81d8b.sol#157)
